sentences.sContent: The nurse is coming to give you an injection.
The school nurse sent Sara home.
sentences.sCn: 学校的护士送萨拉回家。

sentences.sContent: a student nurse (= someone who is learning to be a nurse )
a psychiatric nurse (= a nurse for people who are mentally ill )
He’s been nursing an elderly relative.
sentences.sCn: 他一直在照顾一位年老的亲戚。

sentences.sContent: ...They also had talk therapy with a nurse before and after quit day...

synos.tran: 看护，护理；照顾；培养；给…喂奶

phrases.pCn: 护理师，护师；执业护师，开业护士

words.tran: 养成；教育；培养（形容词nurturant）；养育

trans.tranOther: someone whose job is to look after people who are ill or injured, usually in a hospital
to look after someone who is ill or injured
